boardgame.name: Graantje de voorste
Hick Hack in Gackelwack
Hick Hack nel Pollaio
Kurzy Piknik
Pick Picknic
boardgame.description: _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;A corn, please!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; is the cry heard from many fowl mouths at the cold buffets in the many poultry yards. Game hens, pheasants, ducks, geese, and turkeys seem to be always hungry - never getting enough to eat. In Pick Picknic, a real feast awaits them! The fox is also always hungry and ready to eat, but from a somewhat different menu,... Chickens, geese, and ducks, become happily plump when they are able to eat well and often. Such is not different for the clever fox, who will eat all manner of incautious fowl... At the end of the game, the player who has gotten the plumpest poultry and the most nutritious corn is the winner!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Stefan Dorra's remake of Razzia with the theme centered around chickens and their quest for corn. But watch out, there are foxes out there trying to get to the chickens._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;One of those _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;children's games_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; that adults find fun as well. Features artwork by Doris Matth_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;auml;us._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This game is part of The Chicken Family of Zoch._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Dutch edition is part of the Jakkie _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Bak Collection_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Re-implements_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Razzia_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

ZOCH Version - MINOR DAMAGE TO THE BOX COULD BE SEND AS A LETTER (CHEAPER,FASTER) DISCOUNT RULES: IF YOU BUY 3 OR MORE GAMES YOU´LL GET DISCOUNT. THE PERCENTAGE IS (DAY+MONTH)/2 (Example: If you buy the games on 12th June you´ll get 12+6=18/2=9 %). So you can get a max. Discount on 31th december of 21 % :_). The date is the BGG-TIME (CST). I´m selling a lot of other german boardgames Shipping worldwide (Paypal or cash or Western Union). Bank Transfer is also OK, if there are no further costs for me. All our games are brand new in shrink wrap. Buyer pays for shipping. Shipping will depend on your location and the weight of game. We will discount shipping on multiple games orders whenever possible to ensure the fairest rate. We are not responsible for lost mail but will insure shipment, at your request. Items are shipped within one business day of receiving payment. Payment must be recieved within 7 days after the day you agreed to buy the item, and all PayPal or credit card payments must be made within this time period. If payment isn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t received within these time periods, all orders will be revoked and proper feedback will be left. Unopened merchandise may be returned within 14 days of purchase for a full refund, less original shipping charges. Return shipping charges are the responsibility of the customer with the exception of defective merchandise. To return an item, please contact us prior to sending an item back to us. WA orders pay 8.5% sales tax. Please email us with any questions. Thanks Chum Chum Games chumchumgames@yahoo.com

never played +++++ english + german version +++++++++ could be send as an uninsured letter, please ask for prices +++++ and about insured shipment...international payment : paypal OR direct bank to bank transfer (wich is cost-free inside european union by the way) OR cash (in a registered letter, exchanged into euros already) +++++ payment for germany : paypal OR personal pick up in berlin OR direct bank to bank transfer +++++ for all : no checks ! ++++++++++ international buyers beware : though german postal is relatively fast, they sadly aren´t cheap. it costs bewteen 19 - 37 euros for parcels up to a weight of 5 kg (= about 4 big boxed boardgames). price depends on where the package has to be shipped, so please ask for prices, before you hit the buy button ! +++++ insured shipment inside germany costs 8 eurosbutton ! +++++ shipment inside germany costs 8 euros

Played once, complete and in excellent condition. Buyer prepays via paypal plus USPS Priority Mail Shipping.

I can send you pictures of the game if you wish. Local pickup available near Montreal (Longueuil). I also visit these cities in Quebec so we can agree for a meetup there : Chambly, Montreal, Beloeil, Saint-Hyacinthe, Saint-Hubert. Shipping time within Canada and the US Expect 2 to 7 days, depending on distance from Montreal, QC. If you are on the West Coast, expect about 7 days for the package to reach you. Shipping within Canada There is only one parcel category, and cost varies between $12 and $20 for 1 game, depending on area and weight. Add $3 to $5 for each additional game. Shipping to the US When shipping to the US from Canada, there are three parcel categories, those being small, medium and large. The cost is based on overall area (Length x Width x Height), which is then multiplied by weight. The Canada Post calculator can be found here: http://www.canadapost.ca/cpotools/apps/far/personal/farUS?ex... Shipping examples: Shipping a single game costs between $16 (Medici vs Strozzi) and $25 (standard FFG box size) for the first game, then add $3-5 dollars per game, depending on size _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; weight.

This is the German edition of Pick Picknic. The German instructions are NOT included, rather a color copy of the English rules are included (they have been cut to size in order to fit inside the box). The game is in good condition and has been verified as complete. The cards show a little wear from being handled but none have any rips or damage to them. Box does show moderate wear and has a few corners which have been taped up but overall the box is fine and serves its purpose. Cardboard insert is also present
